relation: Hi Everyone, Dmitry will be visiting with us until Wednesday August 10th. Please send your final comments by then. For the first 10 people to comment, watch for an e-mail from me. You have won a Reinventing Collapse T-shirt. Monday 08 August 2011 03:17:58 pm

Thanks to everyone who has participated in this excellent discussion. I have had such a great time reading all the comments and responses. I love that everyone pitched in to help answer questions and offer comments. Let's hope we can continue with some more great chats. If there is one of our authors you would like to hear from, please just let me know by e-mailing EJ at newsociety.com. For regular updates about new society books, authors and events, you can also subscribe to our newsletter at the bottom right of our home page. Take care and happy prepping to all!
